description.info: Digital Thinking (BIS 111 A) and Software Engineering (CSS 360 C) courses.
Scholarship from CSS Department, University of Washington Bothell.
Project ‘Om – Stress detection, recognition and relief' to solve a campus specific problem. Even got a gift card from Microsoft.
Awarded a grant from CSS Department, University of Washington Bothell towards purchase of equipment required for conducting research.
Secured 1st place at Opus Technical Festival, 2011 for the project 'Simple Hand Gesture Recognition' to control VLC media player.
